name: vscs_activeserviceconfigstatusevent_latest
q: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW uc0010.vscs_activeserviceconfigstatusevent_latest AS WITH   a AS (    SELECT      row_number() OVER (PARTITION BY vehicleplatformidentifier, servicename ORDER BY timestamp DESC) r    , *    FROM      uc0010.vscs_activeserviceconfigstatusevent )  SELECT * FROM   a WHERE (r = 1)

name: vscs_activeserviceconfigstatusevent
q: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW uc0010.vscs_activeserviceconfigstatusevent AS SELECT   vehicleplatformidentifier , servicename , json_extract_scalar(json_array_get(json_extract(doc, '$.contextData'), 0), '$.status') service_status , json_extract_scalar
